entry.title: Mosaic Dreams
entry.summary:
Author: Brechtjeeatscheese

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,518Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 0

Summary: After Eddie moves to Texas, Buck gets struck by ligthing for a second time. But unlike last time, this dream is more fractured, almost like a mosaic. Buck doesn't know what's real and what's not anymore. And all the while the fractured parts of his denail about his feelings for Eddie are breaking apart. Can he confront his feelings before it's too late? Or will he lose his sanity to the dreamworld before that? Check out the art here!

entry.title: Off the Record
entry.summary:
Author: ScribblesAfterDark

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,492Chapters: 28/33Kudos: 77

Summary: As the guys started heading back onto the field, Eddie lagged behind. Part of him wanted to head back out. Throw a few more. Work on his accuracy. But, Coach had said to ice his shoulder, and he followed rules to the letter…at least on the field. When he rounded the corner toward the small athletic training room, the cool air from inside hit him like a wave…and there he was. Evan Buckley, officially part of the athletic training staff, unofficially Eddie Diaz’s favorite member of the training staff. Buck was a Sophomore, one of the student trainers assigned to baseball. He’d said something once about studying sports medicine, wanting to work with pro athletes someday. He didn’t act intimidated by the players like some of the other trainers did…didn’t treat Eddie like some kind of celebrity. It was…refreshing. Eddie hadn’t meant to notice him every time he came in…honestly, he tried not to…but something about the way Buck moved, calm and confident, made it hard to look away. Or, Eddie Díaz has the perfect life laid out for him: star pitcher, bright future, endless expectations. Off the field, though, it starts to crack when he’s drawn to Buck…the one person who refuses to play along.

entry.title: Echoes through the water
entry.summary:
Author: DaniWib

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,104Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 41

Summary: When the wave hit, Buck did what he always did - he fought. For his life, yes, but more importantly, for Christopher’s. And he did it. Against all odds, he found Chris. Saved him. Until he lost him again. So Buck searched. Ignoring the exhaustion, the pain, the strange stillness that filled the ruined streets of LA, he searched. He just had to find Christopher, and everything would be fine. It had to be. Inspired by the interview in which Oliver Stark was told, “If my child went into that water, the next second, I don’t care if it’s suicide, I would be in the water after him.”

entry.title: like a feather of flames on me
entry.summary:
Author: Val_in_a_trenchcoat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,195Chapters: 10/22Kudos: 109

Summary: Evan – Buck – Buckley is a twenty-eight-year old broke college student recently ripped away from his childhood dream job as a firefighter after a life-shattering accident left him permanently disabled. Living on what’s left of his savings while going to college won’t keep him fed, though… but nobody has to know about his scandalous job on the side with Redline Pleasure Anonymous Call Agency. Eddie Diaz is a recently divorced, thirty-year-old college professor and father to the best kid in the world. In light of his recent split, though, he’s made a discovery: his sexuality might not be as straight and narrow as he’s always thought. Instead of panicking, though, he makes the safe, sensible (and budget-breaking) decision to set a hypothesis and test it by calling in to a sex hotline to talk to a male agent. Everyone experiments in college, right? Even the professors. Enter the mysterious Firehose – the hot voice on the other side of the line that Eddie can’t get out of his head.And Buck might just be getting a little crush on the hot professor he keeps doing silent study sessions with in the college library.What will they do when it all collides? [updates every Thursday]

entry.summary:
Author: glazedmercury

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,304Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 70

Summary: For once, Buck doesn’t know what to say. “I’m sorry,” he decides. The syllables sound all wrong in his mouth. “Do you even know what you’re sorry for?” Eddie asks. entry.title: S2 Superwoman: Last Responder
entry.summary:
Author: That_bitch_without_a_life

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,431Chapters: 9/12Kudos: 77

Summary: “I know we haven’t been having that best of luck with partners for you yet, but I think today could really go well Buck.” Bobby says, catching her in between jobs. “Let me guess, I’m meeting him tomorrow whether I like it or not and it’s going to take us less than an hour to realise he’s a misogynist.” “Oh, are we better on Buck’s new work partner again, I bet he doesn’t even last through the first call with her.” Chimney says, Kleenex bottle in hand. “That’s rude Chim, I’ve run the maths and the average is at least two calls, give him that.” Kara responds much to Bobby’s charging. “How about you both give the new guy a chance, he’s fully fresh.” “Wait! Cap you’re giving me a Probie.” TLDR: this is a female buck fic if she was supergirl, just trust the process.

entry.title: these arena lights (holding you down)
entry.summary:
Author: lilacbarnes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,877Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 33

Summary: Push. Glide. Stop. Push. Stride. Stride. Stop. Breathe. Repeat. Repeat. Push. Push. Push. Buck’s legs are screaming, his shin an inferno under his pads. Ignore. Ignore. Push. Stride. Stride. Fuck. Fuck. Fuck.His body collides with the ice. He extends his arms out in time to catch himself before going headfirst into the boards. The wind is knocked out of him as he sits up, rests, breathes in through his nose and out through his mouth. Don’t over do it, Buck.Buck is out of time, is the problem. He’s reminded of it whenever the TV turns on, whenever he opens twitter, opens a sports app. Evan Buckley, golden boy. Season jeopardizing injury. Career jeopardizing injury. Will Evan Buckley ever see the ice again? Golden boy, fallen. A tragedy to the sport of hockey.    Or, Evan Buckley, star forward for the Los Angeles Kings, suffers an injury in the offseason. Eddie Diaz, forward for the Dallas Stars, is traded to the Los Angeles Kings one month into the season.

entry.title: It's a Match
entry.summary:
Author: Theoz_wolf

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,876Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 38

Summary: Running a man down since Bobby's death, the 118 is stretched thin. Forced to request a new recruit, Chimney fears the team will see it as replacing the irreplaceable. Buck, upholding a promise to be strong, is crumbling inside. After Maddie intervenes, Eddie pulls him into a heartfelt Día de Los Muertos with his family. But when the cheerful new rookie arrives, Buck's instant bond with him sparks a surprising, bitter jealousy in Eddie, forcing Hen to help him see the truth behind his feelings before he scares the new probie away for good.

entry.title: skylauncher 3000
entry.summary:
Author: pripripro

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,365Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 48

Summary: Buck is a thrill-seeker; he has been since he was a kid, hopping off trees and skateboarding until his chin met the pavement, leading to many hospital visits and lectures from his parents who tended to be more worried of the financial costs they’d gain from each injury he gave himself then the actual physical well-being of their child. But as he stands on the grounds of the annual state carnival holding a mostly disintegrated and devoured stick of cotton candy in his hand and stares up at the Skylauncher 3000, a drop tower ride with bright flashing neon lights contrasting against the night sky with deafening generic pop music playing from its speakers, he starts to wonder if maybe he’s outgrown the thrill-seeker title altogether.Christopher wants to go on a carnival drop tower ride. Buck has his reservations.

entry.title: Fault Lines
entry.summary:
Author: themrscevans

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,536Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Ava Rousseau never meant to fall for one firefighter — let alone two. What begins as reluctant friendship deepens into something raw and unshakable: love in the wreckage, trust forged in fire. entry.title: All the Ways Home
entry.summary:
Author: 79KJ01

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,011Chapters: 4/30Kudos: 105

Summary: After the lawsuit, Evan Buckley built a new life outside the 118—quiet, careful, controlled. But Los Angeles has a way of pulling him back, and some fires never really go out. When Buck and Eddie find themselves working side-by-side again, the distance they built starts to crumble under everything they never said. From fractured trust to found family, this is a story about healing, home, and the love that finally stops running.

entry.title: around you i'm speechless
entry.summary:
Author: simplyylupin

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,283Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 602

Summary: “You didn’t speak to me all shift,” he says lightly. Or, he tries to say it lightly. It comes out more of an accusation. For a moment, Eddie doesn’t reply, and Buck thinks he might just not. Then, the seat creaks again, the fabric of Eddie’s jacket rustles, and he exhales softly. “I didn’t?” “Nope,” Buck says, popping the ‘p’. “You didn’t even look at me, really.” Eddie huffs a noise that sounds suspiciously like a laugh. “I didn’t look at you?” “Don’t laugh.” “I’m not,” Eddie denies, but he has one of those stupid smiles on his lips. “Hey, I’m not. I’m just– I’m pretty sure I looked at you, Buck.”

  • No Archive Warnings Apply
